Equipment.Gloom Gems (Reference):
Gloom Gems

Source: Crystallized Inert Spectral Energy from defeated Outsiders

Collection Rules:

  • Gathered collectively by squadron
  • Roll dice = Energy Rating, divided evenly among members
  • Mysticism Proficiency: 1 reroll per proficient member
  • Multiple Invasion Levels: Roll separately
  • Total × (1 + Reputation Level) = Gems gained per Magi-Knight
  • Cannot be traded between players
  • Attune to individual Soul Crystal

    • Uses:

  • Exchange with Herald for Shards of Power
  • Exchange with Herald for Armament Runes
  • Exchange with Herald for Visors
  • Other Herald services
